TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelDispatcherCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase>
Public Class ChannelDispatcherCollection Inherits SynchronizedCollection(Of ChannelDispatcherBase)

summary.span: 提供包含通道调度程序的线程安全集合。

span.span: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains channel dispatchers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此集合来管理与主机相关的通道调度程序。This collection is used by to manage the channel dispatchers associated with the host. 调用 时会创建 ，并且可以使用 属性来访问该集合。A is created when is called and the collection can be accessed using the property. 该集合包含对象 (和而不仅仅是实例的) 因为既想保留的开发人员也使用[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]编程模型同时又要替换系统提供的运行时。The collection contains objects (and not just instances of ) because it is also used by developers who want to keep the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]programming model but replace the system-provided runtime. 它们从 派生类，然后通过重写 来扩展 （它是从 派生的），将从 派生的类的实例添加到 。They derive a class from and extend (which inherits from ) by overriding , adding instances of the class derived from to . 此类没有公共构造函数，并且不应在 的外部使用。This class has no public constructors and is not intended to be used outside of the .

summary.span: 从集合中移除所有通道调度程序。

span.span: Removes all channel dispatchers from the collection.

param.span: 要作为元素插入到集合中的通道调度程序。

summary.span: 将通道调度程序插入到集合中的指定索引位置。

span.span: Inserts a channel dispatcher into the collection at a specified index.

exception.span: 与通道调度程序集合关联的服务主机被关闭。

span.span: The service host associated with the channel dispatcher collection is closed.

exception.span: 指定的 小于零或大于集合中的项数。

span.span: The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.

exception.span: 通信对象没有处于任何状态

span.span: The commutation object is not in a state
